Apologies if this has already been requested!

I really can't stand the way the stock fairings fire off into the distance at high speed. Can anyone make a mod that allows you to tweak the ejection force... Id like to create fairings that float away slowly (like the apollo LEM fairings).

I would also love a mod that makes jettisoned fairings into persistent debris.

(please don't just suggest procedural fairings! It's a great mod but I like to play stock on at least one save).

Thanks in advance!

I'm in the planning stages of my proposed SDHI AeroFairings add-on at the moment, so details haven't been finalized. However, tentatively:

- I probably won't make fairing ejection force adjustable, although it would be at a lower value

- I do wish to make fairing debris persistent

- I do wish to make fairing debris persistent

That would be cool, I already dump mine while still suborbital though.

That looks great but its not really what I'm looking for, I'd like a fix for the stock parts, not new parts.

sadly after looking at the part folders it doesnt seem as simple as changing the ejection force in the config ( as you can with decouplers ).

Anything like this been made yet?
